means: 波利尼西亚（中太平洋的岛群）

sentence.Network_en: Maggie's head was spinning in a daze of ultramarine blue far removed from Catholicism or Polynesia.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦琪的思想远离天主教而沉入了让人眼花缭乱的深蓝色中.

sentence.Network_en: The Maori came from the island of Polynesia in the Pacific.
sentence.Network_cn: 毛利人来自太平洋的波利尼西亚岛屿.

sentence.Network_en: It abuts the Tropic of Cancer, constituted the Polynesia archipelago north vanguard.
sentence.Network_cn: 它紧靠北回归线, 构成了波利尼西亚群岛的北方前锋.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 波利尼西亚(Polynesia)佚名波利尼西亚的环礁太平洋三大岛群之一。意为多岛群岛。大致位于180°经线以东,南、北纬30°之间,包括夏威夷群岛、中途岛、约翰斯顿岛、.
an inquiry into the question of cultural stability in polynesia ., 波里尼西亚文化不稳定的疑义.
